item.description:
This years International Festival of Arts and Ideas in New Haven looks to be a blast!  A number of great acts are lined up, so come out to hear about what's going on this June!

Join NHCer Kevin, at a happy hour event where people will discuss the upcoming Festival.  Several other groups from the area will be invited. You are welcome to invite any groups you may be affiliated with and bring as many friends as you like.

At 8pm people will have the option of migrating over from the happy hour social event to "The Grove" across the street at 71 Orange Street, where Kevin will give a short presentation (estimate of roughly 20 minutes.) about the acts coming to this years festival.

The Happy hour portion will be at:

Red Restaurant  (http://www.rednewhaven.com/)

Formerly known as "Fosters", Red changed ownership and got a face lift over the winter.  They are now closed on Mondays, but since this event is on a Wednesday we will be able to meet there.

The Specials will be:

$5 House Wine

$5 Well Drinks

$3 Red Stripes or Bud Lights

Light Snacks will be put out for your enjoyment.

Red is also expecting to have some live music starting at 7pm if that peaks your interest.

Kevin will host this meetup and can be reached at 203-785-9066 (please leave a message if he is unable to answer).  AJ will be lending assistance in hosting this meetup and can be reached at 315-345-9348 (texting is also fine for me).

For more information on this years Festival of Arts and Ideas, visit: http://www.artidea.org/

Hope to see you there.
item.how_to_find_us: Call the Hosts listed in the details, though we'll be mingling in the large groups at the bar.
item.why: It's a Happy Hour, so no reason to be Blue, though we will talk of events on the Green. ;-)
item.name: Special Arts and Ideas Happy Hour @ Red
